name: A Sky Full of Stars (itch)
description:
A Sky Full of Stars 

A Journey of love.

A man who is trying to find his love. 

while you playing the game , you need to open the A Sky Full of Stars-ColdPlay.

Otherwise you cannot feel the game.

Here is the link https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VPRjCeoBqrI

I just try to give the feeling of song in my game. Also this game is protoype of new methods.

I hope you like it.

W-A-S-D to move.

X or Enter action button.
